Nathan Anderson

a bit about me

@mr_ndrsn at Twitter, and @anoldguy at github.

I love coding Ruby, and I’m learning Swift. I’m a Solaris/Linux Admin from 1997, web development since 1998, and have been hacking with Ruby/Rails since 2008.

This last year, I started working with the great people at Basecamp (*wave*), and have enjoying digging deeper into rails, chef, elasticsearch, mysql, docker, and so many other awesome projects!

I also run the OpenHack meetup in Louisville, KY.
